name: Men of Conviction
storyline:
Once hailed as the "new capital of the Northeast", the city is now populated by an army of robots aiming to sow chaos throughout the nation.

Seven years ago, a small faction of rebels tried, unsuccessfully, to stop the robots.

Since then, General Conrad Mann has only grown his mechanical army's power, and the people who might be able to stop him are either dead or missing.
summary: Men of Conviction is an original action platformer following the story of Izik Dang, a soldier of the underground rebel group Men of Conviction. Slash your way through four unique stages with a variety of different enemies. Use Chips to harness the power of the elements to assist you in your fight. Can you find the strength to stand against the trials that await you?
